channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Database Backups
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Database Backups

item.title: CVE-2021-24174|2024-08-03T19:21:18.712Z -- unknown -- database%20backups
item.description: The Database Backups WordPress plugin through 1.2.2.6 does not have CSRF checks, allowing attackers to make a logged in user unwanted actions, such as generate backups of the database, change the plugin's settings and delete backups.
